alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 6:16PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS AND BLOWING SNOW WILL AFFECT PORTIONS OF I-90... Winds have increased in Livingston with gusts to near 50 mph causing reduced visibility in blowing snow. Expect these gusty winds to extend eastward along I-90 toward Big Timber over the next few hours. West to southwest wind gusts to 50 mph with visibilities under 2 miles at times in blowing snow can be expected. Snow drifting over roadways will make roads slick and icy in spots. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Clyde Park, Springdale, Mc Leod and Wilsall. Although this event is expected to be short lived, if conditions worsen, a Winter Weather Advisory may become necessary. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in these situations. Be prepared for difficult crosswinds, poor visibility, and slick roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
